block.p: National Basketball Association ATLANTA HAWKS--Activated G Isaiah Rider .

National Football League NFL--Fined Detroit FS Ron Rice $5,000 for unnecessary roughness against Denver. CHICAGO BEARS--Signed OL Keno Hills. Placed RB Curtis Enis on injured reserve. PITTSBURGH STEELERS--Placed TE Mitch Lyons on injured reserve. Signed OLB Reggie Lowe from the practice squad.
National Basketball Association ATLANTA HAWKS--Activated G Isaiah Rider .

National Football League NFL--Fined Detroit FS Ron Rice $5,000 for unnecessary roughness against Denver. CHICAGO BEARS--Signed OL Keno Hills. Placed RB Curtis Enis on injured reserve. PITTSBURGH STEELERS--Placed TE Mitch Lyons on injured reserve. Signed OLB Reggie Lowe from the practice squad.

National Hockey League DALLAS STARS--Activated LW Jere Lehtinen from injured reserve. PITTSBURGH PENGUINS--Reassigned LW Martin Sonnenberg, C-LW Robert Dome and G Craig Hillier to Wilkes-Barre-Scranton of the AHL. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Recalled LW Kyle Freadrich from Detroit of the IHL. VANCOUVER CANUCKS--Recalled RW Trent Klatt from Syracuse of the AHL.
